https://tmrev.io/movie/986223-Dr. Delirium and the Edgewood Experiments 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/63kT7b7R8jt2cvjfFcGG0e9Loxk.jpg From 1955 to 1975, the US Army used its own soldiers as human guinea pigs in research involving powerful, mind-altering drugs. Told through exclusive footage and first-hand accounts, this is the true story of one of the darkest chapters in US history. Dr. Delirium and the Edgewood Experiments
